text: Bonnie Gail Franklin (January 6, 1944 - March 1, 2013)Bonnie Franklin, star of TV's 'One Day at a Time,' dies at 69 - latimes.com was an American actress. She worked mostly on television. She starred in the situation comedy One Day at a Time. Franklin's father was Russian; her mother was Romanian. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:1944 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Bonnie Franklin
